decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Plans, elevations received 12/12/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes set out in the application submitted.  For the avoidance of doubt it shall not be used as separate self-contained accommodation nor as a bedroom or kitchen.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding at the rear garden of the house
